sourcesContent:
import { Component, OnInit, AfterViewInit } from '@angular/core'; import { trigger, style, transition, animate } from '@angular/animations'; declare var AOS: any; import gsap from 'gsap'; @Component({ selector: 'app-overview', templateUrl: './overview.component.html', styleUrls: ['./overview.component.scss'], animations: [ trigger('titleFadeSlide', [ transition(':enter', [ style({ opacity: 0, transform: 'translateY(-30px)' }), animate('800ms ease-out', style({ opacity: 1, transform: 'translateY(0)' })) ]) ]) ] }) export class OverviewComponent implements OnInit, AfterViewInit { ngOnInit(): void { AOS.init({ duration: 1000, once: true, easing: 'ease-in-out', }); } ngAfterViewInit() { gsap.from('.animate-slide-in', { y: 50, opacity: 0, stagger: 0.2, duration: 1, ease: 'power2.out' }); gsap.from('.developer-section', { opacity: 0, y: 20, duration: 1, delay: 1.2, ease: 'expo.out' }); } }

💼 Expense Tracker

Smarter money, simpler living.

🧾 What is Expense Tracker?

Expense Tracker is a smart personal finance dashboard that helps you organize your monthly spending, manage recurring bills, and monitor your credit balance — all in one place.

💡 Why Use It?

  • Stay on top of your budget: Get a clear breakdown of where your money goes.
  • Avoid missed payments: Track due dates and installments for credit cards, rent, or personal loans.
  • Visualize your progress: See trends, savings, and expenses in easy-to-understand charts.
  • Private and secure: Your financial data is accessible only to you.

📊 What Can You Do With It?

  • Track all your expenses by category, payment method, and location
  • Manage bills with a smart calendar that adjusts as you pay
  • Monitor credit card balance trends month over month
  • View monthly summaries to help make better decisions

👩‍💻 Developed By

Vinithya Reddy Podduturi

Software Developer & UI Enthusiast

GitHub | LinkedIn
